text: Christoph Meier (born 27 October 1952) is a Swiss equestrian. He competed in the team eventing at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Switzerland Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Christoph Meier (equestrian)
